content: then knit 2 plain rounds work decrease round repeat rounds 1-2 until excess gusset sts have been then knit 1 plain round work decrease round only 7 8 decreased away and there are 56 64 72 sts remaining 9 more times until 12 16 20 sts remain 6 8 10 each 28 32 36 each on instep and sole on instep and sole graft instep sts to sole sts continue in pattern as follows until the foot is desired finishing length before toe shaping work instep sts in pattern as established knit to end weave in ends and block if desired there are 3 toe options to choose from standard shaping blunt shaping if your toes are wide at the top or rounded shaping if your toes are wide at the bottom and more narrow at the top for standard or blunt shaping work the foot to 1½ 1¾ 2 inches 4 4 5 5 cm less than desired finished length for rounded shaping work the foot to 2 2 2 1/8 in 5 5 5 25 cm less than desired finished length if the last instep pattern round worked was round 3 or 7 knit one more round plain before proceeding to the toe www littleskein com | anne@littleskein com fresh air | page 4 abbreviations fresh air eyelet chart brackets enclose stitches to be repeated chart shows the full 8-st 8-round pattern repeat and is read cm centimeters from bottom to top right to left co cast on dpns double pointed needles k knit ktbl knit through the back loop k2tog knit two together 1 st decreased lh left hand p purl p2tog purl two together 1 st decreased rs right side sl slip as if to purl ssk slip slip knit slip two stitches separately knitwise then slip them both purlwise back to the left needle and knit them together through the back loop 1 st decreased st s stitch es ws wrong side wyib with yarn in back wyif with yarn in front yo yarnover 1 st increased pattern and photographs © 2020
